name: Google Data Analytics Professional Certificate
SkillWillLearn: Gain an immersive understanding of the practices and processes used by a junior or associate data analyst in their day-to-day job Learn key analytical skills (data cleaning, analysis, & visualization) and tools (spreadsheets, SQL, R programming, Tableau) Understand how to clean and organize data for analysis, and complete analysis and calculations using spreadsheets, SQL and R programming Learn how to visualize and present data findings in dashboards, presentations and commonly used visualization platforms.
SkillGain: Data Analysis Creating case studies Data Visualization Data Cleansing Developing a portfolio Data Collection Spreadsheet Metadata SQL Data Ethics Data Aggregation Data Calculations R Markdown R Programming Rstudio Tableau Software Presentation Data Integrity Sample Size Determination Decision-Making Problem Solving Questioning.
